```{python}
#| label: fig-oscillator-lc-nmos
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "An LC differential oscillator using an NMOS cross-coupled differential pair. $L_1$ and $L_2$ are usually implemented as a single on-chip spiral inductor with a center tap."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.dsp as dsp

sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)

    # cross-coupled NMOS pair
    M1 = elm.AnalogNFet(offset_gate=False).label('$M_1$', loc='right').reverse().drop('source').theta(0)
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/4)
    elm.Line().left(d.unit*1.5).dot()
    pos1 = d.here
    d.push()
    Ibias = elm.SourceI().down()
    elm.Ground()
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().left(d.unit*1.5)
    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4)
    M2 = elm.AnalogNFet(offset_gate=False).label('$M_2$', loc='left').anchor('source').theta(0)

    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4).at(M1.drain).dot()
    d.push()
    l1 = elm.Line().up(d.unit/2).dot()
    d.pop()
    elm.Wire('z').to(M2.gate)

    elm.Line().up(d.unit/4).at(M2.drain).dot()
    d.push()
    l2 = elm.Line().up(d.unit/2).dot()
    d.pop()
    elm.Wire('z').to(M1.gate)

    # LC tank
    elm.CapacitorVar().at(l1.end).to(l2.end).label('$C$', loc='top').flip().reverse()
    l3 = elm.Line().up(d.unit).at(l1.end)
    l4 = elm.Line().up(d.unit).at(l2.end)
    elm.Inductor2(loops=2).at(l3.end).tox(pos1).label('$L_1$', loc='bottom').dot()
    elm.Vdd()
    elm.Inductor2(loops=2).to(l4.end).label('$L_2$', loc='bottom')
```
